DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate blood flow heart stress ass change blood flow psychological treatment participant coronary artery disease . This randomize control study . The aim study assess effect heart rate variability ( HRV ) biofeedback ( versus usual care ) global regional myocardial blood flow ( MBF ) , peripheral vascular function , autonomic change mental stress . All participant undergo myocardial flow/perfusion image positron emission tomography ( PET ) image rest standardize arithmetic mental stress test . Participants undergo repeat test 6 week . At 12 week , participant also undergo limited examination without myocardial perfusion imaging . The intervention group receive biofeedback enrollment , wait-list control group receive intervention week 6 week 12 study visit ( without image ) .
